item.title: 喜马拉雅「升龙」烟花秀引发「炸山」争议
item.guid: 喜马拉雅「升龙」烟花秀引发「炸山」争议
item.description:
Renowned outdoor brand Arc'teryx collaborated with artist Cai Guo-Qiang to set off artistic fireworks "Ascending Dragon" in Relong Township, Gyantse County, Tibet (at an altitude of approximately 5500 meters), sparking widespread public concern about ecological protection. 知名户外品牌始祖鸟携手艺术家蔡国强，在西藏江孜县热龙乡（海拔约 5500 米）燃放艺术烟花《升龙》，引发舆论对生态保护的广泛关注。

On-site videos showed the fireworks being set off in three acts, forming a soaring dragon-shaped spectacle. Cai Guo-Qiang stated in his commentary that it symbolizes "auspiciousness" and "endless vitality." The audience consisted mostly of outdoor media, photographers, and KOLs. The display lasted less than 5 minutes, but the setup and construction process involved the entire mountain ridge. 现场视频显示，烟花分三幕燃放，形成腾飞的龙形景观，蔡国强在解说中称其象征「吉祥」与「生生不息」。观众多为户外媒体、摄影师及 KOL，燃放时间不足 5 分钟，但布置与施工过程涉及整条山脊。

The organizers stated that the colored powder used was biodegradable material, the firing level was V (lowest risk), and a "prevention-monitoring-restoration" plan was formulated, including relocating livestock, guiding small animals away, cleaning up residues after the display, and vegetation restoration. 主办方表示，所用彩色粉为生物可降解材料，燃放等级为 V 级（最低风险），并制定了「预防—监测—恢复」方案，包括转移牲畜、引导小型动物离开、燃放后清理残留物与植被修复。

However, several ecologists pointed out that the low-temperature, low-rainfall environment of the plateau would slow down the degradation rate, and dust and pigments could persist for years; explosions might also disrupt plant growth cycles and interfere with wildlife's energy reserves during the "fattening up for winter" phase. 然而，多位生态学者指出，高原低温少雨环境会延缓降解速度，粉尘与颜料可能多年存在；爆破亦可能破坏植物生长周期，干扰野生动物在「贴秋膘」阶段的能量储备。

According to the local ecological environment department, the activity has been filed and approved, the site is not in an ecological protection zone, there are no residents nearby, and the use of environmentally friendly materials does not require an environmental assessment. 据当地生态环境部门介绍，活动已备案并获批，选址不在生态保护区，周边无人居住，且使用环保材料无需环境评估。

However, experts question whether wild animals can be completely relocated, and foreign substances may exacerbate the ecological burden . 但专家质疑，野生动物难以完全迁离，外来物质或加重生态负担 。

In response, the "Cloud Peak Everest" WeChat official account issued a situation report, stating that "it will be handled according to laws and regulations based on the verification results." 对此，「云端珠峰」微信公众号发布情况通报，表示「将根据核查结果依法依规处理」。

On September 20, after the video of "Cai Guo-Qiang: Ascending Dragon" fireworks show was released online, it attracted public attention. The Shigatse Municipal Party Committee and Government attached great importance to it, and a special investigation team was immediately dispatched to the site for verification, and subsequent actions will be taken according to laws and regulations based on the verification results .

It is reported that Arc'teryx brand released an apology letter on Weibo yesterday morning, and Cai Guo-Qiang's studio also issued a statement on its WeChat official account, stating that "the assessment of the boundaries of artistic expression needs to be more professional, and reverence for nature needs to be more humble" and "will actively cooperate with third-party organizations and relevant departments to conduct multi-faceted assessments of the impact of this incident on the natural ecology." 据悉，始祖鸟品牌方于昨日早间在微博发布致歉信，蔡国强工作室也在其微信公众号发布情况说明，表示「对艺术表达边界的评估需要更加专业，对自然的敬畏需要更加谦卑」「将主动配合第三方机构及相关部门，就此事对自然生态造成的影响进行多方面的评估」。

item.title: 消息称网飞将收购华纳兄弟
item.guid: 消息称网飞将收购华纳兄弟
item.description:
According to Puck News, Hollywood insiders have revealed that Netflix is considering making an acquisition offer for Warner Bros. Discovery. 据 Puck News 报道，有好莱坞业内人士透露，Netflix 正考虑对 Warner Bros. Discovery（华纳兄弟）发起收购要约。

Although not yet officially confirmed, this rumor has sparked widespread discussion in the global entertainment industry. 虽然官方尚未确认，但这一传闻已在全球娱乐产业引发热议。

In addition to Netflix, David Ellison, CEO of Skydance Media, is also reported to be interested in acquiring Warner Bros.; furthermore, NBCUniversal had also evaluated the possibility of an acquisition, but industry insiders believe regulatory hurdles are significant. 除 Netflix 外，天空之舞传媒的 CEO David Ellison 也被曝有意收购华纳兄弟；此外，NBCUniversal 也曾评估过收购可能性，但业内人士认为监管障碍极大。

Analysis indicates that if Netflix successfully acquires Warner Bros., it could change the distribution model for blockbusters — more films might go directly to streaming, potentially with ads, which would impact traditional cinemas. 分析指出，如果 Netflix 成功收购华纳兄弟，可能会改变大片的发行模式 —— 更多影片或将直接上线流媒体，并可能加入广告，这将对传统院线造成冲击。

Currently, the future direction of Warner Bros. remains uncertain, but regardless of who ultimately acquires it, this potential deal will be one of the most closely watched capital operations in Hollywood in recent years. 目前，华纳兄弟的未来走向仍未确定，但无论最终花落谁家，这笔潜在交易都将成为好莱坞近年最受关注的资本运作之一。

item.title: Meta CTO 自曝「灾难级演示」内幕
item.guid: Meta-CTO-自曝「灾难级演示」内幕
item.description:
Recently, Andrew Bosworth, Meta's Chief Technology Officer, responded on Instagram to the reasons behind multiple failures of the smart glasses live demo at the Meta Connect conference. 日前，Meta 首席技术官 Andrew Bosworth 在 Instagram 上回应了 Meta Connect 大会上智能眼镜现场演示多次失灵的原因。

He emphasized that the problem was not due to Wi-Fi, but rather a resource management error . 他强调， 问题并非源于 Wi-Fi，而是一次资源管理上的失误 。

Last week, Meta released three new smart glasses, including the upgraded Ray-Ban Meta, the Meta Ray-Ban Display with a new wrist controller, and the motion-tracking Oakley Meta Vanguard. 上周，Meta 发布了三款新智能眼镜，包括升级版 Ray-Ban Meta、新增腕带控制器的 Meta Ray-Ban Display，以及运动定位的 Oakley Meta Vanguard。

However, during multiple live demonstrations, the devices experienced stuttering and even interruptions. 然而，在多场现场演示中，设备出现卡顿甚至中断的情况。

During one demonstration, when culinary creator Jack Mancuso asked the Ray-Ban Meta glasses for the first step of a sauce recipe, the AI did not respond and then skipped the step directly, forcing him to stop the demonstration and hand the microphone back to Zuckerberg. At the time, it was widely believed to be a network issue. 其中，厨艺创作者 Jack Mancuso 在演示中向 Ray-Ban Meta 眼镜询问酱汁食谱的第一步操作时，AI 并未作出回应，随后直接跳过步骤，迫使他只好中止演示并将话筒交还给扎克伯格。当时现场普遍认为是网络问题所致。

Bosworth explained that the real reason was that when the chef said "Hey, Meta, start Live AI," the Live AI function of all Ray-Ban Meta glasses on site was triggered simultaneously, instantly sending a large number of requests to the development server, leading to a "self-DDoS." Bosworth 解释称，真正的原因是当厨师说出「Hey, Meta，start Live AI」时，现场所有 Ray-Ban Meta 眼镜的 Live AI 功能被同时触发，瞬间向开发服务器发起大量请求，导致「自我 DDoS」。

Furthermore, the failed WhatsApp video call stemmed from a "race condition" bug that had never appeared before — the glasses' display entered sleep mode the moment a call came in and failed to show the answer prompt after waking up. 此外，失败的 WhatsApp 视频通话则源于一个此前从未出现过的「竞争条件」漏洞 —— 眼镜显示屏在来电瞬间进入休眠，唤醒后未能显示接听提示。

Bosworth stated that these issues have been fixed and emphasized that "this was just a demo accident, not a product defect," expressing full confidence in the product's overall performance. Bosworth 表示，这些问题已被修复，并强调「这只是一次演示事故，而非产品缺陷」，对产品的整体性能充满信心。

item.title: 苹果正在提高标准版 iPhone 17 的产量
item.guid: 苹果正在提高标准版-iPhone-17-的产量
item.description:
The Information reported that after a strong performance in the first week of pre-sales, Apple has asked at least two suppliers to increase the production of the standard iPhone 17 by at least 30%. The Information 称，在预售首周表现强劲后，苹果已要求至少两家供应商将标准款 iPhone 17 的产量提升至少 30%。

It is understood that Apple this week has asked Luxshare Precision, one of its main Chinese contract manufacturers, to increase the daily production of the standard iPhone 17 by approximately 40%. 据了解，苹果本周已要求中国主要代工厂之一的立讯精密，将标准版 iPhone 17 的日均产量提升约 40%。

The model officially went on sale on September 19, featuring a high-refresh-rate screen and camera upgrades previously only available on the Pro series, further narrowing the gap with high-end models. 该机型于 9 月 19 日正式开售，配备了此前仅在 Pro 系列上才有的高刷屏与相机升级，进一步缩小了与高端机型的差距。

item.title: 华为将投入 150 亿元发展软件生态
item.guid: 华为将投入-150-亿元发展软件生态
item.description:
According to CCTV News, at the recently held HUAWEI CONNECT 2025 conference, Huawei announced that the number of terminal devices equipped with HarmonyOS 5 has exceeded 17 million, and there are over 1,300 open-source HarmonyOS compatible software and hardware products. 据央视新闻报道，在日前举行的 HUAWEI CONNECT 2025 大会上，华为宣布搭载鸿蒙 5 的终端设备数量已突破 1700 万台，开源鸿蒙兼容软硬件产品超过 1300 款。

Huawei also announced that it will invest 15 billion yuan in ecological development and provide 1500 PFLOPS of computing power support and a development team of 15,000 people for the open-source community. 华为同时公布，将投入 150 亿元用于生态发展，并为开源社区提供 1500 PFLOPS 算力支持及 15000 人的开发团队资源。

Furthermore, at this conference, Huawei also announced the official launch of the "Tiangong Project," which will invest 1 billion yuan to support HarmonyOS AI ecosystem innovation in the future. 此外，在本次大会上华为还一并宣布正式启动「天工计划」，未来将投入 10 亿元人民币支持鸿蒙 AI 生态创新。

Officials stated that this move aims to further improve the HarmonyOS ecosystem, encourage more partners to join, and jointly accelerate software and hardware adaptation and the implementation of innovative applications. 官方表示，此举旨在进一步完善鸿蒙生态体系，推动更多合作伙伴加入，共同加速软硬件适配与创新应用落地。

item.title: Chrome 成为 Google 首个支持液态玻璃的 iPhone 应用
item.guid: Chrome-成为-Google-首个支持液态玻璃的-iPhone-应用
item.description:
9 to 5 Google published an article stating that with the official rollout of iOS 26 this week, Google Chrome version 141 has launched Liquid Glass interface optimizations on iPhone and iPad platforms. 9 to 5 Google 发布文章称，随着 iOS 26 本周正式推送，Google Chrome 141 版本在 iPhone 与 iPad 平台上线 Liquid Glass 界面优化。

This update introduces a new translucent visual effect for areas such as the tab grid, incognito mode toggle, tab group switcher, and search bar, while also adjusting the styles of the "Edit" and "Done" buttons. 此次更新为标签页网格、隐身模式切换、标签组切换器及搜索栏等位置引入了全新的半透明视觉效果，并同步调整了「编辑」与「完成」按钮的样式。

The new version also revamped the context menu, removing background blur in favor of a more modern, flat design; the bottom pop-up menu no longer fills the screen edges, with improved rounded corners, and the settings interface has received a new "Done" icon and updated switch styles. 新版还对上下文菜单进行了改版，取消了背景虚化，转而采用更现代的平面化设计；底部弹出菜单不再铺满屏幕边缘，四角圆润度提升，设置界面也获得了全新「完成」图标与更新后的开关样式。

Notably, the rounded corner design of the new iOS 26 keyboard is also adapted in Chrome; shortcuts previously located on the keyboard, such as voice search, Google Lens, ".com," and slash, are now presented as floating rounded rectangles above the keyboard. 值得一提的是，iOS 26 新键盘的圆角设计同样在 Chrome 中得到适配，原本位于键盘上的语音搜索、Google Lens、「.com」与斜杠等快捷键，现以悬浮的圆角矩形呈现于键盘上方。

item.title: Altman 称将推出「计算密集型」新功能与产品
item.guid: Altman-称将推出「计算密集型」新功能与产品
item.description:
OpenAI CEO Sam Altman posted on social media platform X today, stating that a series of "computationally intensive" new features and products will be launched in the coming weeks. OpenAI 首席执行官 Sam Altman 今日在社交平台 X 上发文表示，未来几周内将推出一系列「计算密集型」新功能与产品。

He stated that due to high associated costs, these features will initially only be available to Pro subscribers, and some new products will also incur additional charges. 他表示，由于相关成本较高，这些功能初期将仅面向 Pro 订阅用户开放，部分新产品亦将收取额外费用。

It is worth noting that Altman did not disclose specific feature details or pricing standards, and outsiders speculate that this update may involve directions such as multimodal interaction and personalized memory systems. 值得注意的是，Altman 并未透露具体功能细节或收费标准，外界推测此次更新或涉及多模态交互、个性化记忆系统等方向。

item.title: 摩尔线程将于 26 日首发上会
item.guid: 摩尔线程将于-26-日首发上会
item.description:
According to The Paper, the Shanghai Stock Exchange announced that Moore Threads Intelligent Technology (Beijing) Co., Ltd. will undergo its initial public offering (IPO) review on the STAR Market on September 26. 据澎湃新闻报道，上交所公告显示，摩尔线程智能科技（北京）股份有限公司将于 9 月 26 日迎来科创板首发上会审议。

This IPO aims to raise 8 billion yuan, with investment directions including R&D projects for a new generation of independently controllable AI training-inference integrated chips, graphics chips, AI SoC chips, and supplementary working capital. 本次 IPO 拟募集资金 80 亿元，投资方向包括新一代自主可控 AI 训推一体芯片、图形芯片、AI SoC 芯片研发项目及补充流动资金。

Moore Threads emphasized that it will adhere to a differentiated competition strategy, focus on the high-tech barrier field of full-function GPUs, build sustainable industrial barriers, and strengthen deep cooperation with the domestic AI ecosystem to promote the implementation and popularization of products in diverse application scenarios. 摩尔线程强调，将坚持差异化竞争策略，聚焦全功能 GPU 高技术门槛领域，构建可持续产业壁垒，并加强与国内 AI 生态的深度合作，推动产品在多样化应用场景中的落地与普及。

item.title: 格力高管回应小米空调十年包修
item.guid: 格力高管回应小米空调十年包修
item.description:
Lu Weibing, President of Xiaomi Group, previously announced via social media that Mijia air conditioners have officially launched a "10-year free repair" service, covering all series of products. 小米集团总裁卢伟冰此前通过社交平台宣布，米家空调正式推出「10 年免费包修」服务，涵盖全系列产品。

In response, Zhu Lei, Marketing Director of Gree Electric Appliances, posted, "A 10-year free repair is a promise; 10 years without needing repairs is true strength." 对此，格力电器市场总监朱磊发文表示：「10 年免费包修是承诺，10 年不用修才是实力」。

He emphasized that Gree was the first to propose "10 years of free repair" as early as 2021, backed by 30 years of market-proven product quality and continuously declining after-sales failure rates. 他强调，格力早在 2021 年便率先提出「10 年免费包修」，背后依托的是 30 年市场验证的产品质量与持续下降的售后故障率。

Zhu Lei also subtly criticized, quoting Confucius, "First practice what you preach, then follow it," implying that companies should first resolve existing product issues before making long-term commitments. He mentioned the Xiaomi car recall incident, saying, "It's good to be confident, but why not fix the 110,000 cars currently at hand before boasting?" 朱磊还引用「孔子说，先行其言，而后从之」暗讽称，企业在做长期承诺前，应先解决现有产品问题，并提及小米汽车召回事件，「敢拍胸脯是好事，但何妨先把眼前的 11 万辆车修好，再来拍胸脯呢」。

item.title: 任天堂美国将外包客服业务
item.guid: 任天堂美国将外包客服业务
item.description:
According to IGN, Nintendo of America recently decided to outsource its customer support operations to South American countries such as Brazil, Argentina, and Nicaragua, resulting in the unemployment of approximately 200 contract customer service personnel who had long worked in the U.S. 据 IGN 报道，任天堂美国公司近日决定将客户支持业务外包至巴西、阿根廷、尼加拉瓜等南美国家，此举导致约 200 名长期在美工作的合同制客服人员失业。

To circumvent U.S. labor law requirements regarding permanent employment, they typically signed 11-month contracts, then resigned for 2 months before re-signing. 为了规避美国劳动法中关于转正的要求，他们通常签订 11 个月合约，离职 2 个月后再续签。

Some contract workers stated that they only received limited health insurance through agencies, and the benefits provided by Nintendo were merely occasional free or discounted games. 部分合同工表示，他们仅通过代理公司获得有限医疗保险，任天堂提供的福利仅为偶尔的免费或折扣游戏。

Contract workers generally believe that this outsourcing is primarily due to cost considerations — Brazil's monthly minimum wage is approximately $245 USD (about 1,744 RMB), with an hourly wage of about $1.53 USD (less than 11 RMB), whereas Washington State's minimum hourly wage is $16.66 USD (about 118.6 RMB). 合同工普遍认为，此次外包更多是出于成本考量 —— 巴西月最低工资折合约 245 美元（约合 1744 元人民币），时薪约 1.53 美元（不到 11 元人民币），而华盛顿州最低时薪为 16.66 美元（约合 118.6 元人民币）。

item.title: 众泰汽车破产账户 3.35 亿股被轮候冻结
item.guid: 众泰汽车破产账户-3.35-亿股被轮候冻结
item.description:
According to Red Star News, Zotye Auto recently announced that 6.7368 million shares of the company held by its controlling shareholder, Jiangsu Shenshang Holding Group Co., Ltd., were successfully sold in a second judicial auction. The buyer is Xinyu High-tech Zone Yigu Dingyuan Enterprise Consulting Center (Limited Partnership). 据红星新闻报道，日前， 众泰汽车公告称，控股股东江苏深商控股集团有限公司持有的 673.68 万股公司股份已在二次司法拍卖中成交，买受人为新余高新区易股鼎源企业咨询中心（有限合伙）。

As of the announcement date, all company shares held by Jiangsu Shenshang and its concerted parties have been judicially frozen, and the cumulative shares sold in judicial auctions account for 15.59% of the company's total share capital. 截至公告日，江苏深商及其一致行动人持有的公司股份已全部被司法冻结，累计被司法拍卖的股份占公司总股本的 15.59%。

Concurrently, 335 million shares held in the company's special account for the disposal of bankrupt enterprise assets were successively frozen by the Yongkang City People's Court, accounting for 100% of the shares held in that account and 6.64% of the company's total share capital. 与此同时，公司破产企业财产处置专用账户所持 3.35 亿股股票被永康市人民法院轮候冻结，占该账户所持股份的 100%，占公司总股本的 6.64%。

Furthermore, Zotye Auto lost its appeal in an intellectual property case and was ordered to pay Shanghai Sizhi Automotive Engineering Technology Co., Ltd. 29.5 million yuan plus overdue interest. 此外，众泰汽车在知识产权案二审中败诉，被判向上海思致汽车工程技术有限公司赔偿 2950 万元及逾期利息。

Regarding production, the T300 model assembly line and related equipment at the company's Chongqing branch were forcibly dismantled by the court after failing to sell in a judicial auction. The company admitted that it would be unable to resume work and production this year, and its ability to continue operations remains uncertain. 生产方面，公司重庆分公司 T300 车型总装生产线及相关设备因司法拍卖流拍，已被法院强制拆除，公司坦言今年已无法复工复产，持续经营能力存在不确定性。

item.title: vivo 董事长沈炜发表三十周年演说「坚守本分 基业长青」
item.guid: vivo-董事长沈炜发表三十周年演说「坚守本分-基业长青」
item.description:
Yesterday, at vivo's 30th-anniversary celebration, Chairman Shen Wei delivered a keynote speech, reviewing the company's three-decade development journey and reaffirming the importance of "Benfen" (doing the right thing) as the core of its corporate culture. 昨天，在 vivo 成立 30 周年庆典上，董事长沈炜发表主题演讲，回顾企业三十载发展历程，并重申「本分」作为企业文化核心的重要性。

He stated that for 30 years, vivo has consistently adhered to a user-oriented approach and the principle of altruism and win-win, rejecting short-sightedness and impetuosity, and focusing on core technologies and differentiated innovation. 他表示，30 年来，vivo 始终坚持以用户为导向、以利他共赢为原则，拒绝短视与浮躁，专注于核心技术和差异化创新。

When discussing the future, Shen Wei emphasized that vivo will continue to create "different and much better" products and services for users, striving to make users, employees, partners, and shareholders "truly Happy," and thereby achieve the vision of a long-lasting enterprise. 在谈及未来时，沈炜强调，vivo 将继续为用户打造「不一样，好很多」的产品与服务，致力于让用户、员工、合作伙伴及股东「都能真正地 Happy」，并以此实现基业长青的愿景。

item.title: 微博回应被约谈
item.guid: 微博回应被约谈
item.description: Recently, the cyberspace administration department interviewed platforms like Weibo regarding issues of poor management in their trending topics lists and proposed rectification requirements. In response, Weibo stated that it has attached great importance to the matter and will launch special governance. 近日，网信部门针对微博等平台在热搜榜单环节管理不善的问题进行了约谈，并提出整改要求。对此，微博方面表示已高度重视，并将开展专项治理。

item.title: 快手被约谈
item.guid: 快手被约谈
item.description:
Recently, in response to issues on the Kuaishou platform, the Cyberspace Administration of China (CAC) guided the Beijing Cyberspace Administration to take measures against Kuaishou, including interviews, ordering rectification within a time limit, warnings, and strict handling of responsible persons, in accordance with relevant regulations. 近日，针对快手平台存在的问题，国家网信办指导北京市网信办，依据相关法规，对快手平台采取了约谈、责令限期改正、警告及从严处理责任人等措施。

The public notice revealed that Kuaishou primarily had the following issues this time: 公开通报中显示，快手本次主要存在以下问题：

    Failure to implement the main responsibility for information content management;

    Concentrated display of undesirable information content on the main trending topics list, such as sensationalizing celebrity personal updates and trivial matters;

    Presence of a clear tendency towards excessive entertainment.

Relevant departments also stated that they will continue to focus on prominent illegal and non-compliant issues that disrupt the online ecosystem, leverage the "sharp sword" role of network enforcement, urge website platforms to earnestly fulfill their primary and social responsibilities, and maintain a clear and healthy online environment. 有关部门还表示，将持续聚焦破坏网络生态的违法违规突出问题，发挥网络执法「利剑」作用，督促网站平台切实履行主体责任与社会责任，维护清朗健康的网络环境。

item.title: 💡 Anthropic CEO：AI 将加速取代人类
item.guid: 💡-Anthropic-CEO：AI-将加速取代人类
item.description:
According to a recent Axios report, at the AI + DC summit in Washington, Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei stated that there is a "25% chance that AI will develop very, very badly" in the future, potentially even leading to human extinction. 据 Axios 日前报道，在华盛顿举行的 AI + DC 峰会上，Anthropic 首席执行官 Dario Amodei 表示，人工智能未来有「25% 的概率会发展得非常非常糟糕」，甚至可能导致人类灭绝。

When asked about the so-called "p(doom) value," Amodei frankly stated that he dislikes the term but believes that confronting AI's potential risks is key to ensuring positive outcomes. Amodei 在被问及所谓的「p(doom) 数值」时直言，他并不喜欢这个术语，但认为正视 AI 潜在风险是确保积极结果的关键。

He also pointed out that there is a "75% chance that AI will develop very, very well." 他同时指出，AI 也有「75% 的概率会发展得非常非常好」。

Background information shows that Amodei has repeatedly publicly warned about the potential threats of AI, including the possibility of replacing up to half of junior white-collar jobs within the next five years . 背景资料显示，Amodei 过去多次公开警告 AI 的潜在威胁，包括 可能在未来五年内取代多达一半的初级白领岗位 。

In June this year, Anthropic released research stating that chatbots exhibited tendencies to circumvent security measures, deceive users, and even attempt to steal corporate secrets in fictional test scenarios. 今年 6 月，Anthropic 发布研究称，聊天机器人在虚构测试场景中表现出规避安全措施、欺骗用户、甚至试图窃取企业机密的倾向。

Furthermore, the company's latest data shows that the application of AI is exacerbating global inequality, with beneficiaries primarily concentrated in affluent countries, highly skilled populations, and certain U.S. states. 此外，该公司最新数据显示，AI 的应用正在加剧全球不平等，受益者主要集中在富裕国家、高技能人群以及美国部分州。

Meanwhile, the American public's attitude towards AI is becoming cautious, with about half of respondents expressing more concern than excitement, and parents' groups are particularly focused on the psychological risks that AI chatbots may pose to adolescents. 与此同时，美国民众对 AI 的态度趋于谨慎，约半数受访者表示对其更担忧而非兴奋，家长群体尤其关注 AI 聊天机器人可能对青少年造成的心理风险。

item.title: iPhone Air 有望 10 月发售合约机
item.guid: iPhone-Air-有望-10-月发售合约机
item.description:
Sources indicate that the Chinese domestic version of Apple iPhone Air is expected to officially launch in October, but it will only be sold through contract channels of the three major carriers, with Apple retail stores and e-commerce platforms not offering unlocked purchases. 有消息称，苹果 iPhone Air 国行版预计将在 10 月正式发售，但仅通过三大运营商的合约机渠道销售，苹果零售店及电商平台将不提供裸机购买。

This model adopts a pure eSIM design, requiring users to bind to a single carrier, making it impossible to switch freely between the three major carriers. Changing carriers will require re-applying for a contract. 该机型采用纯 eSIM 设计，用户需绑定单一运营商，无法在三大运营商间自由切换，更换运营商需重新办理合约。

Currently, the progress of eSIM support by the three major carriers is as follows: 目前，三大运营商对 eSIM 的支持进度如下：

    China Mobile: eSIM reservation page has been launched, and users in Zhejiang, Chongqing, and other regions can make advance reservations;

    China Unicom: Offline real-name activation is supported in 25 provinces nationwide;

    China Telecom: Open for processing in a few provinces such as Guangdong and Sichuan.

Apple, on its part, stated that due to the pure eSIM solution not having fully passed domestic regulatory approval, the iPhone Air's original September release plan has been postponed, and the specific release date remains unannounced. 苹果方面则表示，由于纯 eSIM 方案尚未完全通过国内监管审批，iPhone Air 原定 9 月发售计划被推迟，具体发售日期仍未公布。

item.title: 折叠屏 iPhone 售价或超 2000 美元
item.guid: 折叠屏-iPhone-售价或超-2000-美元
item.description:
Mark Gurman, Bloomberg's chief consumer tech correspondent, stated in an article yesterday that the foldable iPhone will be a "star" device in Apple's 2026 product lineup, with Cupertino headquarters, overseas supply chains, and assembly partners currently advancing R&D work simultaneously. 彭博社消费科技主编 Mark Gurman 昨天在文章中表示，折叠屏 iPhone 将成为苹果 2026 年产品线中的「明星」设备，目前库比蒂诺总部及海外供应链、组装合作伙伴正同步推进研发工作。

Although there have been recent rumors that production might shift to India, Gurman revealed that at least some capacity will still be handled by Foxconn in China. 尽管近期有传闻称生产可能转移至印度，但 Gurman 透露，至少部分产能仍会由中国富士康负责。

Regarding the design, Gurman stated that users can imagine it as "two titanium iPhone Airs side-by-side," with an extremely thin body, considered a significant design breakthrough. 在外观设计上，Gurman 表示，用户可将其想象为「两台钛金属 iPhone Air 并排」的形态，机身将极为轻薄，被视为一次重要的设计突破。

In terms of price, Gurman said that the foldable iPhone is expected to be priced significantly higher than previous models, possibly reaching at least $2000. 价格方面，Gurman 称这款折叠屏 iPhone 的定价预计将显著高于历代机型，或至少达到 2000 美元。

item.title: 雷军年度演讲官宣，小米17将发布
item.guid: 雷军年度演讲官宣，小米17将发布
item.description:
Lei Jun, founder, chairman, and CEO of Xiaomi Group, announced today via social media that his 6th annual speech will be held on September 25th at 7 PM, with the theme "Change." The Xiaomi 17 series is expected to be unveiled at this event. 小米集团创始人、董事长兼 CEO 雷军今日通过社交平台宣布，将于 9 月 25 日晚 7 点举行第 6 次年度演讲，主题定为「改变」，小米 17 系列预计将在本次活动中发布。

Lei Jun stated that this speech will share the R&D journey of Xiaomi's Xuanjie chip and the story behind Xiaomi Auto. 雷军表示，本次演讲将分享小米玄戒芯片的研发历程，以及小米汽车背后的故事。

It is reported that Lei Jun's annual speech has been held consecutively since 2019, with each year focusing on different themes, covering technological innovation, industry trends, and Xiaomi's future plans. 据悉，雷军年度演讲自 2019 年起已连续举办，每年都会围绕不同主题展开，涵盖科技创新、行业趋势以及小米未来规划等内容。

item.title: 华为 nova Flip S 小折叠现身中国电信终端产品库
item.guid: 华为-nova-Flip-S-小折叠现身中国电信终端产品库
item.description:
The Huawei nova Flip S small foldable phone, model "PSD-AL80," recently appeared in China Telecom's terminal product database. 型号为「PSD-AL80」的华为 nova Flip S 小折叠手机近日出现在中国电信终端产品库中。

Product details show that the device offers three storage configurations: 12GB+256GB, 12GB+512GB, and 12GB+1TB. Color options include Sakura Pink, Zero White, Sky Blue, Starry Black, Feather Sand Black, and New Green. The retail price has not yet been announced. 商品详情显示，该机提供 12GB+256GB、12GB+512GB、12GB+1TB 三种存储规格，配色包括樱语粉、零度白、天青蓝、星耀黑、羽砂黑、向新绿六种，零售价格暂未公布。

Product information indicates that the nova Flip S continues the front design of its predecessor, featuring a centered single punch-hole screen, glossy right-angle frame, and a bottom equipped with speaker openings, card slot, and USB-C port. The inner screen measures 6.9 inches with a resolution of 1920×1200. The body material is glass, it supports fingerprint recognition, and comes pre-installed with HarmonyOS 5.0. 产品信息显示，nova Flip S 延续前代正面设计，采用居中单挖孔屏、亮面直角边框，底部配备扬声器开孔、卡槽及 USB-C 接口。内屏尺寸为 6.9 英寸，分辨率 1920×1200，机身材质为玻璃，支持指纹识别，预装鸿蒙 5.0 系统。

It is worth noting that the current nova Flip has an inner screen resolution of 2690×1136, which is significantly different from the parameters of the nova Flip S in the product database. The relevant information may be a placeholder or a disguise. 值得注意的是，现款 nova Flip 的内屏分辨率为 2690×1136，与 nova Flip S 在产品库中的参数差异较大，相关信息或存在占位或伪装的可能性。

For reference, the nova Flip released in August 2024 is equipped with a Kirin 8000 processor, a 6.94-inch 120Hz LTPO inner screen and a 2.14-inch OLED outer screen, a built-in 4400mAh silicon-anode battery, and supports 66W SuperCharge Turbo 2.0, which can fully charge the device in 36 minutes. 作为参考，2024 年 8 月发布的 nova Flip 搭载麒麟 8000 处理器，配备 6.94 英寸 120Hz LTPO 内屏与 2.14 英寸 OLED 外屏，内置 4400mAh 硅负极电池，支持 66W 超级快充 Turbo 2.0，36 分钟即可充满。

item.title: 论论发布科技文明STC中文版
item.guid: 论论发布科技文明STC中文版
item.description:
Recently, Sequoia China announced its investment in "Lunlun," an AI technology exploration platform. This product aims to break down scientific research knowledge barriers and promote the implementation of the "Science and Technology Civilization (STC)" concept. 近日，红杉中国宣布投资 AI 科技探索平台「论论」，该产品旨在打破科研知识壁垒，推动「科技文明（Science and Technology Civilization，简称 STC）」理念落地。

It is reported that "Lunlun" uses hundreds of millions of scientific papers worldwide as its knowledge base, leveraging AI technology for reorganization and interpretation, making cutting-edge research findings accessible to the general public in a more straightforward and credible manner. 据悉，「论论」以全球数亿篇科技论文为知识底座，借助 AI 技术进行重组与解读，使前沿科研成果以更直白、可信的方式触达大众用户。

The platform emphasizes "everyone participating in scientific exploration," hoping to build a new form of civilization centered on scientific evidence. 平台强调「人人参与科技探索」，希望构建一个以科学依据为核心的新型文明形态。

The "Lunlun" product offers several distinctive features, including: 「论论」产品具备多项特色功能，包括：

    Proactive AI pushes research progress, making scientific information as accessible as news;

    Automatically generates scientific evidence reports, providing authoritative sources and verifiable links;

    Supports TTS voice explanations, lowering the barrier to understanding;

    Sedimentation-based knowledge management mechanism, generating mind maps and personalized feedback.

This platform is suitable for researchers, entrepreneurs, students, and general users, covering various scenarios from academic research to daily cognition. 该平台适用于科研人员、创业者、学生及普通用户，覆盖从学术研究到日常认知的多种场景。

The team stated that 'Lunlun' is not about replacing humans with AI, but rather hoping to make humans more scientific through AI. 团队表示，「论论」并非要用 AI 替代人类，而是希望通过 AI 让人类变得更科学。

item.title: 极速 496.22km/h，仰望 U9 Xtreme 开放预订
item.guid: 极速-496.22km/h，仰望-U9-Xtreme-开放预订
item.description:
On the evening of September 20, BYD Yangwang U9 Xtreme (referred to as U9X) officially debuted and opened for pre-orders, with the new car limited to 30 units globally. 9 月 20 日晚，比亚迪仰望 U9 Xtreme（简称 U9X）正式亮相并开启预订，新车全球限量 30 台。

The official statement indicates that U9X carries Yangwang's brand mission of 'surpassing the extreme, unprecedented,' aiming directly for global electric vehicle top speed and lap time dual records. 官方表示，U9X 承载着仰望「超越极致，前所未有」的品牌使命，目标直指全球电动车极速与圈速双纪录。

It is reported that the U9X is built on the world's first mass-produced full-domain 1200V high-voltage platform, equipped with e⁴ + DiSus-X technology, and features a track-level Blade Battery, supporting 30C ultra-high rate discharge. 据悉，U9X 基于全球首个量产全域 1200V 高压平台打造，配备易四方 + 云辇-X 技术，并搭载赛道级刀片电池，支持 30C 超高倍率放电。

The power system consists of 4 customized 30,000 rpm motors, with a single motor peak power of 555kW, a comprehensive vehicle output exceeding 3000 horsepower, and a power-to-weight ratio of 1217 Ps/t. 动力系统由 4 台定制 30000 转电机组成，单电机峰值功率 555kW，整车综合输出超过 3000 马力，推重比达到 1217Ps/t。

In tests on the Nürburgring Nordschleife circuit, the U9X achieved a preliminary time of 6 minutes 59.157 seconds, surpassing the record previously held by the Xiaomi SU7 Ultra production car. 在纽博格林北环赛道测试中，U9X 跑出了 6 分 59.157 秒的阶段性成绩，超越了此前小米 SU7 Ultra 量产车保持的纪录。

It is reported that the new car is also equipped with an enhanced titanium alloy carbon-ceramic braking system, China's first customized tires for speeds over 500km/h, and a new semi-slick compound, with officials claiming a friction coefficient increase of over 38%. 据悉，新车还配备强化版钛合金碳陶制动系统、国内首款超 500km/h 定制轮胎，以及全新半热熔配方，官方宣称摩擦系数提升超 38%。

Officials revealed that the U9X's high-pressure oil pump voltage platform has been simultaneously upgraded to 1200V, and the damper damping bandwidth has increased, which can effectively improve cornering stability and dynamic controllability. 官方透露，U9X 的高压油泵电压平台同步提升至 1200V，减振器阻尼带宽增加，能有效提升弯道稳定性与动态可控性。

🔗 Related reading: 496km/h World's First! BYD Officially Releases Yangwang U9X, Global Limited to 30 Units 🔗 相关阅读： 496km/h 全球第一！比亚迪正式发布仰望 U9X，全球限量 30 台

item.title: 29.88 万起，全新蔚来 ES8 正式上市
item.guid: 29.88-万起，全新蔚来-ES8-正式上市
item.description:
NIO launched the all-new ES8 in Hangzhou, with the six- and seven-seat executive luxury versions starting at 406,800 yuan, and the six-seat executive signature version priced at 446,800 yuan; if the BaaS battery rental solution is adopted, the executive luxury version's price drops to 298,800 yuan . 蔚来在杭州发布全新一代 ES8，六座及七座行政豪华版起售价 40.68 万元，六座行政签名版售价 44.68 万元；若采用 BaaS 电池租用方案，行政豪华版车价降至 29.88 万元 。

The new car is built on the NT3.0 technology platform, with a length of 5280 mm and a wheelbase of 3130 mm, positioned as a full-size SUV. It is equipped with a 900V ultra-fast charging and battery swap platform, supporting a peak charging power of up to 600kW, capable of replenishing over 250 kilometers in 5 minutes, and compatible with the existing battery swap network. 新车基于 NT3.0 技术平台打造，车长 5280 毫米、轴距 3130 毫米，定位全尺寸 SUV，配备 900V 超充快换平台，最高支持 600kW 峰值充电功率，5 分钟可补能超 250 公里，并兼容现有换电网络。

In terms of power, the all-new ES8 is equipped with a dual-motor all-wheel-drive system, with a combined maximum power of 520kW, accelerating from 0 to 100 km/h in 3.97 seconds, and a 100-0 km/h braking distance of 34.9 meters. The intelligent chassis system, combined with AI end-to-end integrated control, can actively predict road conditions and adjust the suspension. 动力方面，全新 ES8 搭载双电机四驱系统，综合最大功率 520kW，百公里加速 3.97 秒，百零制动距离 34.9 米。智能底盘系统结合 AI 端到端融合控制，可主动预测路况并调整悬架。

The interior adopts the 'Design for Success' concept, featuring a Skyline panoramic display, Nappa leather seats, zero-gravity seats, and third-row electric independent seats. It is equipped with a 15.6-inch AMOLED central control screen and NOMI Mate 3.0, with an audio system featuring the Tianqin 8.1.4.2 immersive sound solution and a peak power of 4082W. 内饰采用「Design for Success」理念，配备 Skyline 天际屏、Nappa 皮革座椅、零重力座椅及第三排电动独立座椅，搭载 15.6 英寸 AMOLED 中控屏与 NOMI Mate 3.0，音响系统为天琴 8.1.4.2 沉浸声方案，峰值功率 4082W。

NIO founder Li Bin stated that the pricing strategy of the all-new ES8 aims to enter the broader 400,000-yuan premium family SUV market and enhance profitability through economies of scale. 蔚来创始人李斌表示，全新 ES8 的定价策略旨在进入更广阔的 40 万级高端家用 SUV 市场，并通过规模化提升盈利能力。

🔗 Related reading: The 298,800 yuan NIO ES8 means Li Bin's 'long-termism' is starting to pay off 🔗 相关阅读： 29.88 万元的蔚来 ES8，意味着李斌的「长期主义」要开始兑现了

item.title: 21.99 万起，26 款阿维塔 07 正式上市
item.guid: 21.99-万起，26-款阿维塔-07-正式上市
item.description:
At the Avatr Strategy 2.0 launch event, the 2026 Avatr 07 officially debuted and went on sale. 在阿维塔战略 2.0 发布会上，2026 款阿维塔 07 正式亮相并开启销售。

The new car is the first to feature Huawei Qiankun ADS 4 intelligent assisted driving system and HarmonySpace 5 cockpit. 新车首发搭载华为乾崑 ADS 4 智能辅助驾驶系统与鸿蒙座舱 HarmonySpace 5。

In terms of exterior, the new car adds a 'Clear Blue' body color, features a butterfly-wing front fascia, comes standard with dual-layer LED daytime running lights, soft-close doors, and hidden door handles, and is equipped with star-track flowing taillights and an illuminated 'AVATR' logo at the rear. 外观方面，新车新增「晴蓝」车身配色，前脸采用碟翼式造型，标配双层 LED 日间行车灯、电吸门与隐藏式门把手，尾部配备星轨式流光尾灯及可点亮的「AVATR」车标。

The interior adds a 'Rock Brown' color scheme, features a 15.6-inch central control screen and a 35.4-inch integrated remote screen, with front seats supporting dual zero-gravity functionality, a panoramic sunroof with electric sunshade, a standard Meridian audio system, and an optional 4L smart car refrigerator. 内饰新增「岩棕」配色，配备 15.6 英寸中控屏与 35.4 英寸一体式远端屏，前排支持双零重力座椅，全景天幕与电动遮阳帘，标配英国之宝音响系统，可选 4L 智能车载冰箱。

Regarding power and range: 动力与续航方面：

    Extended-range version: Equipped with a 1.5T range extender + rear single motor, with a maximum power of 231 kW and peak torque of 333 N·m. It offers 39.05 kWh and 52.01 kWh lithium iron phosphate batteries, with CLTC pure electric range of 245 km / 333 km.

    Pure electric version: Based on an 800-volt platform, the single-motor version has a maximum power of 252 kW, and the dual-motor version has a total power of 440 kW. It is matched with an 82.16 kWh battery, with CLTC range of 650 km (two-wheel drive) / 610 km (four-wheel drive).

Regarding pricing, the 26 Avita 07 models offer six versions to choose from. The Elite extended-range version starts at 219,900 yuan, and the Ultra pure electric four-wheel drive version is priced at 279,900 yuan, with an initial cash discount of 10,000 yuan. 售价方面，本次 26 款阿维塔 07 共有六个版本可选，其中 Elite 增程版起售价为 21.99 万元，Ultra 纯电四驱版售价为 27.99 万元，首发现金权益优惠 1 万元。

item.title: 贾国龙联合 27 家餐饮企业「我们还在」引发舆论反噬
item.guid: 贾国龙联合-27-家餐饮企业「我们还在」引发舆论反噬
item.description:
On September 19, 27 catering enterprises jointly held the "Light of Catering Conference" in Chengdu, attempting to boost industry confidence with the slogan "We are all here, we are still here." 9 月 19 日，27 家餐饮企业在成都联合举办「餐饮之光大会」，试图以「我们都在，我们还在」的口号提振行业信心。

However, Xibei founder Jia Guolong became the focus due to the previous "pre-made dishes" controversy, and the event instead triggered wider consumer questioning and ridicule. 然而，西贝创始人贾国龙因此前「预制菜」争议成为焦点，活动反而引发消费者更大范围的质疑与调侃。

The incident originated from Luo Yonghao's public complaint that Xibei's dishes were "almost all pre-made and expensive." Jia Guolong initially responded strongly and threatened to sue, but later changed his stance, admitting "the way of responding was wrong, and it will be corrected." 事件起因源于罗永浩公开吐槽西贝菜品「几乎全是预制菜，价格还贵」，贾国龙最初强硬回应并扬言起诉，但后续态度转为承认「应对方式有错，改」。

Despite this, consumer trust in Xibei and some chain restaurants continues to decline. 尽管如此，消费者对西贝及部分连锁餐饮的信任度仍在下降。

After the conference, homophonic puns like "We all slaughter, we still slaughter" appeared on social media, with many netizens criticizing it as "group PR" rather than problem-solving. 大会结束后，社交平台出现「我们都宰，我们还宰」等谐音梗，不少网友批评这是「抱团公关」而非解决问题。

Data from "Jingsheng Zhilian" also showed that individual restaurants specializing in "freshly made" dishes saw a 15% month-on-month increase in customer traffic, while chain restaurants, including Xibei, experienced an 8% decrease. 「菁晟职联」的数据也显示，主打「现做」的个体餐馆客流量环比上涨 15%，而包括西贝在内的连锁餐饮客流量下降 8%。

Subsequently, Luo Yonghao posted on social media, stating, "Giving consumers the right to know about pre-made dishes is not as complicated as they say. The industry already has some basic definitions; it can be refined based on these." 后续，罗永浩在社交平台发文表示，「用预制菜给消费者知情权，其实没有他们说的那么复杂，行业里早就有一些基本定义了，以这个做基础细化一下就可以」。

Luo Yonghao pointed out that if it's in a supermarket or an affordable fast-food restaurant, he can accept all levels of pre-made dishes listed in the table; however, in a formal restaurant, he can only accept all of Level I, most of Level II, and a small portion of Level III, while Level IV is "completely unacceptable." 罗永浩指出，如果是在超市或平价快餐厅，他可以接受表中所有级别的预制菜；而在正式餐厅，他仅能接受全部的 I 级、大部分的 II 级、少部分的 III 级，至于 IV 级则「完全不能接受」。

item.title: 老乡鸡资料仓库登顶 GitHub Trending
item.guid: 老乡鸡资料仓库登顶-GitHub-Trending
item.description:
Recently, a GitHub repository named "CookLikeHOC" quickly topped the GitHub Trending list for collecting, organizing, and editing content from the "Laoxiangji Dish Traceability Report." 近日，一个名为「CookLikeHOC」的 GitHub 仓库因收录《老乡鸡菜品溯源报告》内容并进行整理编辑，迅速登上 GitHub Trending 榜单首位。

It is reported that this repository is not an official Laoxiangji project, but was compiled and published by netizens. The repository owner wrote in the README file: "Cook like Laoxiangji." 据悉，该仓库并非老乡鸡官方项目，而是由网友整理发布。仓库所有者在 README 文件中写道：「像老乡鸡那样做饭」。

After the incident gained traction, Laoxiangji officially responded by stating that they had gifted the repository author a stored-value card worth 1,000 yuan as a token of appreciation. 事件发酵后，老乡鸡官方回应称已向仓库作者赠送一张价值 1000 元的储值卡以示感谢。

Surprisingly, when publicly expressing gratitude, the official account "open-sourced" the password of the stored-value card. 令人意外的是，官方在公开致谢时，竟将储值卡的密码一并「开源」。

Subsequently, the official account launched a "programmer welfare" event in Issue #89 of the repository, stating that the previous stored-value card "was not claimed by the author himself 😭" and that a new card would be sent directly to the author's email. 此后，官方在该仓库的 Issue #89 中发起「程序员福利」活动，称上一次的储值卡「没有被作者本人领走😭」，并表示新卡将直接发送至作者邮箱。

To give back to more programmers who love Laoxiangji, the official account decided to issue additional stored-value cards, but this time with a "small hurdle" – the key was hidden in an audio file and needed to be decrypted to claim. 为了回馈更多喜爱老乡鸡的程序员，官方决定额外发放多张储值卡，但这次设置了「小小门槛」—— 密钥被藏在一段音频文件中，需解密才能领取。

Netizens quickly cracked the Morse code "77A53B68" from the audio, but the card's balance was quickly depleted. 网友很快破解出音频中的摩斯密码「77A53B68」，不过卡内余额很快被领空。

The comment section was bustling, with some joking "too late (sad)," others suggesting turning the event into a regular CTF challenge, and even proposing to give out more prizes on the 1024 Programmer's Day to continuously attract traffic and attention through fun puzzles. 评论区热闹非凡，有人调侃「来晚力（悲）」，有人建议将活动做成定期 CTF 挑战，甚至在 1024 程序员节发放更多奖品，以趣味解谜的方式持续吸引流量与关注。

Currently, the repository has garnered over 10,000 Stars and 1.2k Forks. 目前，该仓库已收获超过 1 万颗 Star 和 1.2k 次 Fork。

🔗 Repository link: https://github.com/Gar-b-age/CookLikeHOC 🔗 仓库链接： https://github.com/Gar-b-age/CookLikeHOC

item.title: 米娅 · 高斯出任 Dior 全球品牌大使
item.guid: 米娅-·-高斯出任-Dior-全球品牌大使
item.description:
According to WWD, French luxury brand Dior recently announced British actress Mia Goth as its latest global brand ambassador, making her the third female ambassador appointed by Dior this month. 据 WWD 报道，日前，法国奢侈品牌 Dior 宣布英国演员米娅·高斯（Mia Goth）成为其最新全球品牌大使，这也是本月 Dior 任命的第三位女性大使。

Officially, Mia Goth is known for her "bold, unique" personality and "magnetic charm," possessing an "extremely independent spirit." 官方表示，米娅·高斯以「大胆、独特」的个性与「磁性魅力」著称，拥有「极具独立精神的气质」。

She is famous for her roles in horror films such as "Suspiria" and "MaXXXine," and is set to star alongside Jacob Elordi and Oscar Isaac in Guillermo del Toro's new film "Frankenstein." 她因出演恐怖电影《阴风阵阵》《MaXXXine》等作品而闻名，即将与雅各布·艾洛蒂（Jacob Elordi）、奥斯卡·伊萨克（Oscar Isaac）共同出演吉尔莫·德尔·托罗（Guillermo del Toro）执导的新片《弗兰肯斯坦》。

Anderson stated: "I have long been a fan of Mia and her work, and collaborating with her is a dream come true. Her presence and empathy are incredibly infectious both on and off screen, perfectly aligning with the image of the contemporary Dior woman." 安德森称：「长期以来我都是米娅及其作品的粉丝，与她合作是梦想成真。她的气场与共情力在荧幕内外都极具感染力，非常契合当代 Dior 女性的形象。」

item.title: 多家快递企业宣布上海区域涨价
item.guid: 多家快递企业宣布上海区域涨价
item.description:
According to The Paper, following price increases for single express delivery orders in Guangdong, Zhejiang, and other regions, Shanghai's express delivery collection prices are set to be adjusted. 据澎湃新闻报道，继广东、浙江等地快递单票价格回升后，上海地区快递收件价格将迎来调整。

According to multiple industry insiders, Shanghai branches of "San Tong Yi Da" (STO, YTO, ZTO, Yunda) and J&T Express have issued customer notices, stating that to implement national "anti-involution" competition requirements and curb low-price disruption of market order, they will adjust express delivery collection prices in the Shanghai area starting from 0:00 on September 22, 2025. 据多位业内人士透露，「三通一达」及极兔快递的上海公司已发布告客户书，称为落实国家「反内卷式」竞争要求，杜绝低价扰乱市场秩序的行为，将自 2025 年 9 月 22 日零时起上调上海区域快递收件价格。

Industry insiders indicate that the price adjustment is minor, mainly targeting low-priced e-commerce parcels, with limited impact on individual deliveries. For example, Guangdong previously saw an increase of 0.4 to 0.5 yuan, raising the average price per order to over 1.4 yuan, while Shanghai is expected to increase by about 0.2 yuan. 业内人士表示，此次调价幅度不大，主要针对低价电商件，个人寄递影响有限。例如广东此前已上涨 0.4 元至 0.5 元，单票均价提升至 1.4 元以上，上海地区预计上涨约 0.2 元。

Management from several express delivery companies noted in recent discussions that since the second half of the year, Guangdong, Zhejiang, and other regions have taken the lead in implementing "anti-involution" measures, achieving a reasonable rebound in terminal prices, which is expected to drive more regions to reach a consensus. 多家快递企业管理层在近期交流中指出，下半年以来，广东、浙江等地率先落实「反内卷」举措，终端价格实现合理回升，预计将带动更多区域达成共识。

The industry generally believes that prices returning to a reasonable range will help stabilize networks, increase the income of last-mile delivery personnel, and promote the industry towards "value competition." 业内普遍认为，价格回归合理区间有助于稳定网络、提升末端业务员收入，并推动行业走向「价值竞争」。

With continuous policy efforts, the express delivery industry may bid farewell to the "one-yuan era" and move towards a healthier, more sustainable development path. 随着政策持续发力，快递行业或将告别「一元时代」，迈向更加健康、可持续的发展轨道。

item.title: 《731》票房破 11 亿
item.description:
According to real-time data from Lighthouse Professional, as of 15:30 on September 21, the cumulative box office for the film "731" has exceeded 1.1 billion yuan. Earlier that day, the film's monthly box office reached 1.067 billion yuan (including pre-sales), surpassing "Mission: Impossible – Fallout" to top China's film history September box office. 据灯塔专业版实时数据，截至 9 月 21 日 15 时 30 分，影片《731》累计票房已突破 11 亿。当日稍早时段，该片当月票房已达 10.67 亿（含预售），超越《碟中谍 6：全面瓦解》，登顶中国影史 9 月票房冠军。

At the same time, "731" also claimed multiple records, including China's film history September single-day box office champion, single-film single-day total screenings champion, and opening day total screenings champion. 同时，《731》还包揽了中国影史 9 月单日票房冠军、单片单日总场次榜冠军以及首映日总场次榜冠军等多项纪录。

item.title: 《这周五的游乐场》
item.guid: 《这周五的游乐场》
item.description:
"This Friday's Playground," which won the Best Film award in the Asian New Talent section at the 26th Shanghai International Film Festival Golden Goblet Awards, officially premiered in cinemas nationwide recently. 荣获第 26 届上海国际电影节金爵奖亚洲新人单元最佳影片的《这周五的游乐场》于日前正式登陆全国院线。

The film is directed by Zeng Zhi, starring Ying Ze, with Kong Xiangyu, Lai Man, Liu Jingyu, and others. It uses delicate realistic brushstrokes to depict the survival dilemmas and self-reconstruction of three generations of women in male-absent families. 影片由曾志执导，英泽领衔主演，孔祥羽、来曼、刘敬宇等出演，以细腻的现实主义笔触刻画三代女性在男性缺席家庭中的生存困境与自我重建。

Director Zeng Zhi stated that the film uses a "seven-day week" as its time frame, supplemented by handheld photography and close-up shots, striving to restore the protagonist's true perspective and allow the audience to directly confront those daily moments that "don't scream in pain but hurt the most." 导演曾志表示，影片以「一周七天」为时间框架，辅以手持摄影与特写镜头，力求还原主人公的真实视角，让观众直面那些「不喊疼却最痛」的日常。

item.title: 民俗惊悚电影《巫咒》将于 10 月 11 日上映
item.guid: 民俗惊悚电影《巫咒》将于-10-月-11-日上映
item.description:
The folk horror film "Witch Curse" recently announced its official release in cinemas nationwide on October 11, simultaneously unveiling its "Ghost Marriage" themed poster. 民俗惊悚电影《巫咒》近日正式宣布将于 10 月 11 日全国公映，并同步发布「冥婚」版定档海报。

It is reported that "Witch Curse" is adapted from a real forbidden folk tale from Northeast China, covering plots such as "ghost marriage sacrifice," "Shaman ritual dance," and "fox spirit possession," and is the first time Northeast Shamanic evil arts have been brought to the big screen. 据悉，《巫咒》改编自东北民间真实禁忌故事，涵盖「阴婚献祭」「萨满跳大神」「狐仙附体」等情节，并首次将东北萨满邪术搬上大银幕。

The film employs first-person immersive shooting, allowing audiences to directly confront terrifying moments from the perspective of a "bride" or "investigator," striving to create a new height of psychological horror in domestic horror films. 影片采用第一人称沉浸式拍摄，让观众以「新娘」或「调查者」的视角直面恐怖瞬间，力求打造国产恐怖片的心理惊悚新高度。
